mapper.sql: ID_, DOC_NO, LOG_ID, EVENT_TYPE, ERROR_CODE, LOG_DETAILS, EVENT_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into P_DOC_UPLOAD_LOG_DETAILS (ID_, DOC_NO, LOG_ID, EVENT_TYPE, ERROR_CODE, LOG_DETAILS, EVENT_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logDetails,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{eventTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into P_DOC_UPLOAD_LOG_DETAILS
ID_,
DOC_NO,
LOG_ID,
EVENT_TYPE,
ERROR_CODE,
LOG_DETAILS,
EVENT_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{docNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{logDetails,jdbcType=CLOB},
#{eventTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update P_DOC_UPLOAD_LOG_DETAILS
DOC_NO = #{docNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOG_ID = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVENT_TYPE = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERROR_CODE = #{errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOG_DETAILS = #{logDetails,jdbcType=CLOB},
EVENT_TIME = #{eventTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update P_DOC_UPLOAD_LOG_DETAILS set DOC_NO = #{docNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOG_ID = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVENT_TYPE = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERROR_CODE = #{errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOG_DETAILS = #{logDetails,jdbcType=CLOB}, EVENT_TIME = #{eventTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ERROR_CODE, A.LOG_DETAILS, A.EVENT_TIME, D.DICT_NAME AS LOG_ID FROM P_DOC_UPLOAD_LOG_DETAILS A LEFT JOIN (SELECT B.DICT_NAME, B.DICT_CODE FROM BTP_DICTIONARY B INNER JOIN BTP_DICTIONARY_TYPE C ON B.DICTTYPE_ID = C.TYPE_ID AND C.TYPE_CODE = 'errorCodeType') D ON A.ERROR_CODE = D.DICT_CODE where A.LOG_ID = #{logId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and A.EVENT_TYPE = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.EVENT_TIME DESC
